summary: Email correspondence regarding the unsealing order for the indictment in U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The email includes an attachment of the indictment and confirms the unsealing order has been signed.

persons.name: Katharine Parker
persons.context: Sent the unsealing order email from a nysd.uscourts.gov address.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the indictment attached to the email (U.S._v._Ghislaine_Maxwellindictment.pdf).

events.title: Unsealing order signed for Maxwell indictment
events.description: An unsealing order for the indictment in U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell was signed and communicated via email.

keyFacts: The indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell was unsealed on July 2, 2020.
Email correspondence confirms the transmission of the unsealing order and the indictment document.
The document is part of the legal process in the U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell case.
